public class LinkedBlockingQueue<E>{
        //å†…éƒ¨ç±»Nodeå°±æ˜¯é“¾è¡¨çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å¯¹è±¡å¯¹åº”çš„ç±»ï¼š
        static class Node<E> {
        E item;//å°è£…ä½ è¦è£…çš„é‚£ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 
        
        Node<E> next;//ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªNodeèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åœ°å€
        Node(E x) { item = x; }//æ„é€ å™¨
    }
        //é“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦
        private final int capacity;
        //è®¡æ•°å™¨ï¼š
        private final AtomicInteger count = new AtomicInteger();
        //é“¾è¡¨çš„å¤´ç»“ç‚¹
        transient Node<E> head;
        //é“¾è¡¨çš„å°¾ç»“ç‚¹
        private transient Node<E> last;
        //å–å…ƒç´ ç”¨çš„é”
        private final ReentrantLock takeLock = new ReentrantLock();
        //ç­‰å¾…æ± 
    private final Condition notEmpty = takeLock.newCondition();
    //æ”¾å…ƒç´ ç”¨çš„é”
    private final ReentrantLock putLock = new ReentrantLock();
    //ç­‰å¾…æ± 
    private final Condition notFull = putLock.newCondition();
        
        public LinkedBlockingQueue() {
        this(Integer.MAX_VALUE);//è°ƒç”¨ç±»æœ¬ç±»çš„ç©ºæ„é€ å™¨ï¼Œä¼ å…¥æ­£21äº¿
    }
        
        public LinkedBlockingQueue(int capacity) {
                //å¥å£®æ€§è€ƒè™‘
        if (capacity <= 0) throw new IllegalArgumentException();
                //ç»™é˜Ÿåˆ—æŒ‡å®šé•¿åº¦  
        this.capacity = capacity;
                //lastï¼ŒheadæŒ‡å‘ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ–°çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸­ å…ƒç´ ä¸ºnull 
        last = head = new Node<E>(null);
    }
        
        
        //å…¥é˜Ÿï¼š
        private void enqueue(Node<E> node) {
        last = last.next = node;
    }
        
        //å‡ºé˜Ÿï¼š
        private E dequeue() {
        Node<E> h = head;//hæŒ‡å‘äº†head
        Node<E> first = h.next;//first æŒ‡å‘headçš„next
        h.next = h; // help GC   h.nextæŒ‡å‘è‡ªå·±ï¼Œæ›´å®¹æ˜“è¢«GCå‘ç° è¢«GC
        head = first;//headçš„æŒ‡å‘æŒ‡ä¸ºfirst
        E x = first.item;//å–å‡ºé“¾ä¸­ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œç»™äº†x
        first.item = null;
        return x;//æŠŠxä½œä¸ºæ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼
    }
}

public class User implements Delayed {
    private int id;//ç”¨æˆ·id
    private String name;//ç”¨æˆ·åå­—
    private long endTime;//ç»“æŸæ—¶é—´
    public int getId() {
        return id;
    }
    public void setId(int id) {
        this.id = id;
    }
    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }
    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }
    public long getEndTime() {
        return endTime;
    }
    public void setEndTime(long endTime) {
        this.endTime = endTime;
    }
    public User(int id, String name, long endTime) {
        this.id = id;
        this.name = name;
        this.endTime = endTime;
    }
    //åªåŒ…è£…ç”¨æˆ·åå­—å°±å¯ä»¥
    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "User{" +
                "name='" + name + '\'' +
                '}';
    }
    @Override
    public long getDelay(TimeUnit unit) {
        //è®¡ç®—å‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´ å‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´å°äº0 <=0  è¯æ˜å·²ç»åˆ°æœŸ
        return this.getEndTime() - System.currentTimeMillis();
    }
    @Override
    public int compareTo(Delayed o) {
        //é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æ•°æ® åˆ°æœŸæ—¶é—´çš„æ¯”è¾ƒ
        User other = (User)o;
        return ((Long)(this.getEndTime())).compareTo((Long)(other.getEndTime()));
    }
}

    //æ—¶é—´åˆ°ï¼Œé€€å‡ºæ¸¸æˆï¼Œé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­ç§»é™¤ï¼š
    public void logout(){

    //è·å–åœ¨çº¿äººæ•°ï¼š
    public int onlineSize(){

    //è¿™æ˜¯mainæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç¨‹åºçš„å…¥å£
    public static void main(String[] args) {

        test.login(new User(3,"ç‹äº”",System.currentTimeMillis()+10000));
        //ä¸€ç›´ç›‘æ§
        while(true){
            //åˆ°æœŸçš„è¯ï¼Œå°±è‡ªåŠ¨ä¸‹çº¿ï¼š

}

public class Test03 {

public class TestDeadLock implements Runnable {
    public int flag = 1;
    static Object o1 = new Object(),o2 = new Object();
        
        
    public void run(){
        System.out.println("flag=" + flag);
        // å½“flag==1é”ä½o1
        if (flag == 1) {
            synchronized (o1) {
                try {
                    Thread.sleep(500);
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                // åªè¦é”ä½o2å°±å®Œæˆ
                synchronized (o2) {
                    System.out.println("2");
                }
            }
        }
        // å¦‚æœflag==0é”ä½o2
        if (flag == 0) {
            synchronized (o2) {
                try {
                    Thread.sleep(500);
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                // åªè¦é”ä½o1å°±å®Œæˆ
                synchronized (o1) {
                    System.out.println("3");
                }
            }
        }
    }
        
        
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // å®ä¾‹2ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ç±»
        TestDeadLock td1 = new TestDeadLock();
        TestDeadLock td2 = new TestDeadLock();
        td1.flag = 1;
        td2.flag = 0;
        // å¼€å¯2ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹
        Thread t1 = new Thread(td1);
        Thread t2 = new Thread(td2);
        t1.start();
        t2.start();

            produceCondition.signal();
        }finally {
            lock.unlock();

    }
}

public class Test04 {
    //è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªmainæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ˜¯ç¨‹åºçš„å…¥å£ï¼š
    public static void main(String[] args)  {
        //1.æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæºæ–‡ä»¶
        File f1 = new File("d:\\Test.txt");
        //2.æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç›®æ ‡æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š
        File f2 = new File("d:\\Demo.txt");
        //3.æä¸€ä¸ªè¾“å…¥çš„ç®¡ æ€¼åˆ°æºæ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šï¼š
        FileReader fr = null;
        FileWriter fw = null;
        try {
            fr = new FileReader(f1);
            //4.æä¸€ä¸ªè¾“å‡ºçš„ç®¡ï¼Œæ€¼åˆ°ç›®æ ‡æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šï¼š
            fw = new FileWriter(f2);
            //5.å¼€å§‹åŠ¨ä½œï¼š
            char[] ch = new char[5];
            int len = fr.read(ch);
            while(len!=-1){
                String s = new String(ch,0,len);
                fw.write(s);
                len = fr.read(ch);
            }
        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            //6.å…³é—­æµï¼š(å…³é—­æµçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå€’ç€å…³é—­ï¼Œåç”¨å…ˆå…³)
            try {
                if(fw!=null){//é˜²æ­¢ç©ºæŒ‡é’ˆå¼‚å¸¸
                    fw.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(fr!=null){
                    fr.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }
}

public class Test02 {

import java.io.Serializable;


public class User implements Serializable {
    private static final long serialVersionUID = 9050691344308365540L;
    private String name;
    private String pwd;

    public String getName() {
        return name;
    }

    public void setName(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }

    public String getPwd() {
        return pwd;
    }

    public void setPwd(String pwd) {
        this.pwd = pwd;
    }

    public User(String name, String pwd) {
        this.name = name;
        this.pwd = pwd;
    }
}

import java.io.\*;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class TestClient {//å®¢æˆ·ç«¯

    //è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªmainæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ˜¯ç¨‹åºçš„å…¥å£ï¼š
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        //1.åˆ›å»ºå¥—æ¥å­—ï¼šæŒ‡å®šæœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ipå’Œç«¯å£å·ï¼š
        Socket s = new Socket("192.168.199.217",8888);

        //å½•å…¥ç”¨æˆ·çš„è´¦å·å’Œå¯†ç ï¼š
        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
        System.out.println("è¯·å½•å…¥æ‚¨çš„è´¦å·ï¼š");
        String name = sc.next();
        System.out.println("è¯·å½•å…¥æ‚¨çš„å¯†ç ï¼š");
        String pwd = sc.next();
        //å°†è´¦å·å’Œå¯†ç å°è£…ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªUserçš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼š
        User user = new User(name,pwd);


        //2.å¯¹äºç¨‹åºå‘˜æ¥è¯´ï¼Œå‘å¤–å‘é€æ•°æ® æ„Ÿå— --ã€‹åˆ©ç”¨è¾“å‡ºæµï¼š
        OutputStream os = s.getOutputStream();
        ObjectOutputStream oos = new ObjectOutputStream(os);
        oos.writeObject(user);


        //æ¥æ”¶æœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯çš„å›è¯--ã€‹åˆ©ç”¨è¾“å…¥æµï¼š
        InputStream is = s.getInputStream();
        DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(is);
        boolean b = dis.readBoolean();
        if(b){
            System.out.println("æ­å–œï¼Œç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ");
        }else{
            System.out.println("å¯¹ä¸èµ·ï¼Œç™»å½•å¤±è´¥");
        }

        //3.å…³é—­æµ + å…³é—­ç½‘ç»œèµ„æºï¼š
        dis.close();
        is.close();
        oos.close();
        os.close();
        s.close();
    }
}

import java.io.\*;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;


public class TestServer {//æœåŠ¡å™¨

    //è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªmainæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ˜¯ç¨‹åºçš„å…¥å£ï¼š
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        //1.åˆ›å»ºå¥—æ¥å­—ï¼š æŒ‡å®šæœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ç«¯å£å·
        ServerSocket ss = null;
        Socket s = null;
        InputStream is = null;
        ObjectInputStream ois = null;
        OutputStream os = null;
        DataOutputStream dos = null;
        try {
            ss = new ServerSocket(8888);
            //2.ç­‰ç€å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘æ¥çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š
            s = ss.accept();//é˜»å¡æ–¹æ³•:ç­‰å¾…æ¥æ”¶å®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ•°æ®ï¼Œä»€ä¹ˆæ—¶å€™ç¨‹åºç»§ç»­å‘ä¸‹æ‰§è¡Œã€‚
            //accept()è¿”å›å€¼ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªSocketï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªSocketå…¶å®å°±æ˜¯å®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„Socket
            //æ¥åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªSocketä»¥åï¼Œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å’ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨æ‰çœŸæ­£äº§ç”Ÿäº†è¿æ¥ï¼Œæ‰çœŸæ­£å¯ä»¥é€šä¿¡äº†
            //3.æ„Ÿå—åˆ°çš„æ“ä½œæµï¼š
            is = s.getInputStream();
            ois = new ObjectInputStream(is);

            //4.è¯»å–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘æ¥çš„æ•°æ®ï¼š
            User user = (User)(ois.readObject());

            //å¯¹å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯ï¼š
            boolean flag = false;
            if(user.getName().equals("å¨œå¨œ")&&user.getPwd().equals("123123")){
                flag = true;
            }

            //å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¾“å‡ºç»“æœï¼š---ã€‹æ“ä½œæµ---ã€‹è¾“å‡ºæµ
            os = s.getOutputStream();
            dos = new DataOutputStream(os);
            dos.writeBoolean(flag);
        } catch (IOException \| ClassNotFoundException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            //5.å…³é—­æµ+å…³é—­ç½‘ç»œèµ„æºï¼š
            try {
                if(dos!=null){
                    dos.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(os!=null){
                    os.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(ois!=null){
                    ois.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(is!=null){
                    is.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(s!=null){
                    s.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(ss!=null){
                    ss.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }




    }
}

            os = s.getOutputStream();

            //æ¥æ”¶æœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯çš„å›è¯--ã€‹åˆ©ç”¨è¾“å…¥æµï¼š
            is = s.getInputStream();

        } catch (IOException e) {

        } finally{
            //3.å…³é—­æµ + å…³é—­ç½‘ç»œèµ„æºï¼š
            try {

            } catch (IOException e) {

                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {

                    oos.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {

                    os.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {

                }
            } catch (IOException e) {

            }
        }




    }
}

import java.io.\*;
import java.net.Socket;


public class ServerThread extends Thread {//çº¿ç¨‹ï¼šä¸“é—¨å¤„ç†å®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„è¯·æ±‚
    InputStream is = null;
    ObjectInputStream ois = null;
    OutputStream os = null;
    DataOutputStream dos = null;
    Socket s = null;
    public ServerThread(Socket s){
        this.s = s;
    }
    @Override
    public void run() {
        try{
            //2.ç­‰ç€å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘æ¥çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

            is = s.getInputStream();
            ois = new ObjectInputStream(is);

            //4.è¯»å–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å‘æ¥çš„æ•°æ®ï¼š
            User user = (User)(ois.readObject());

            //å¯¹å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯ï¼š
            boolean flag = false;
            if(user.getName().equals("å¨œå¨œ")&&user.getPwd().equals("123123")){
                flag = true;
            }

            //å‘å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¾“å‡ºç»“æœï¼š---ã€‹æ“ä½œæµ---ã€‹è¾“å‡ºæµ
            os = s.getOutputStream();
            dos = new DataOutputStream(os);
            dos.writeBoolean(flag);
        }catch (IOException \| ClassNotFoundException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }finally {
            try {
                if(dos!=null){
                    dos.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(os!=null){
                    os.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(ois!=null){
                    ois.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            try {
                if(is!=null){
                    is.close();
                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }
}

        try {

                //æ¯æ¬¡è¿‡æ¥çš„å®¢æˆ·ç«¯çš„è¯·æ±‚ é  çº¿ç¨‹å¤„ç†ï¼š

public enum State {
    /\*\*
        \* Thread state for a thread which has not yet started.
            \*/
            NEW,

    /\*\*
        \* Thread state for a runnable thread. A thread in the runnable
            \* state is executing in the Java virtual machine but it may
            \* be waiting for other resources from the operating system
                \* such as processor.
                \*/
                RUNNABLE,

    /\*\*
        \* Thread state for a thread blocked waiting for a monitor lock.
            \* A thread in the blocked state is waiting for a monitor lock
                \* to enter a synchronized block/method or
                \* reenter a synchronized block/method after calling
                \* {@link Object\#wait() Object.wait}.
                \*/
                BLOCKED,

    /\*\*
        \* Thread state for a waiting thread.
            \* A thread is in the waiting state due to calling one of the
            \* following methods:
    \* \<ul\>
        \* \<li\>{@link Object\#wait() Object.wait} with no timeout\</li\>
        \* \<li\>{@link \#join() Thread.join} with no timeout\</li\>
        \* \<li\>{@link LockSupport\#park() LockSupport.park}\</li\>
        \* \</ul\>
        \*
        \* \<p\>A thread in the waiting state is waiting for another thread to
            \* perform a particular action.
            \*
            \* For example, a thread that has called \<tt\>Object.wait()\</tt\>
            \* on an object is waiting for another thread to call
                \* \<tt\>Object.notify()\</tt\> or \<tt\>Object.notifyAll()\</tt\> on
                \* that object. A thread that has called \<tt\>Thread.join()\</tt\>
                \* is waiting for a specified thread to terminate.
                    \*/
                    WAITING,

    /\*\*
        \* Thread state for a waiting thread with a specified waiting time.
            \* A thread is in the timed waiting state due to calling one of
            \* the following methods with a specified positive waiting time:
    \* \<ul\>
        \* \<li\>{@link \#sleep Thread.sleep}\</li\>
        \* \<li\>{@link Object\#wait(long) Object.wait} with timeout\</li\>
        \* \<li\>{@link \#join(long) Thread.join} with timeout\</li\>
        \* \<li\>{@link LockSupport\#parkNanos LockSupport.parkNanos}\</li\>
        \* \<li\>{@link LockSupport\#parkUntil LockSupport.parkUntil}\</li\>
        \* \</ul\>
        \*/
        TIMED_WAITING,

    /\*\*
        \* Thread state for a terminated thread.
            \* The thread has completed execution.
            \*/
            TERMINATED;
}

public class Test01 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, InstantiationException {
        //è·å–å­—èŠ‚ç ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š
        Class cls = Student.class;

        //é€šè¿‡å­—èŠ‚ç ä¿¡æ¯å¯ä»¥è·å–æ„é€ å™¨ï¼š
        //getConstructorsåªèƒ½è·å–å½“å‰è¿è¡Œæ—¶ç±»çš„è¢«publicä¿®é¥°çš„æ„é€ å™¨
        Constructor[] c1 = cls.getConstructors();
        for(Constructor c:c1){
            System.out.println(c);

        System.out.println("-------------------");
        //getDeclaredConstructors:è·å–è¿è¡Œæ—¶ç±»çš„å…¨éƒ¨ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦çš„æ„é€ å™¨
        Constructor[] c2 = cls.getDeclaredConstructors();

        System.out.println("-------------------");
        //è·å–æŒ‡å®šçš„æ„é€ å™¨ï¼š
        //å¾—åˆ°ç©ºæ„é€ å™¨
        Constructor con1 = cls.getConstructor();

        Constructor con2 = cls.getConstructor(double.class, double.class);

        //å¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°çš„æœ‰å‚æ„é€ å™¨ï¼šå¹¶ä¸”æ˜¯privateä¿®é¥°çš„
        Constructor con3 = cls.getDeclaredConstructor(int.class);

        //æœ‰äº†æ„é€ å™¨ä»¥åæˆ‘å°±å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡ï¼š
        Object o1 = con1.newInstance();

        Object o2 = con2.newInstance(180.5, 170.6);
        System.out.println(o2);
    }
}

public class Test03 {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InstantiationException, InvocationTargetException {
        //è·å–å­—èŠ‚ç ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š
        Class cls = Student.class;
        //è·å–æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
        //getMethods:è·å–è¿è¡Œæ—¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•è¿˜æœ‰æ‰€æœ‰çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆè¢«publicä¿®é¥°ï¼‰
        Method[] methods = cls.getMethods();

        //getDeclaredMethods:è·å–è¿è¡Œæ—¶ç±»ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
        Method[] declaredMethods = cls.getDeclaredMethods();

        //è·å–æŒ‡å®šçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
        Method showInfo1 = cls.getMethod("showInfo");
        System.out.println(showInfo1);
        Method showInfo2 = cls.getMethod("showInfo", int.class, int.class);
        System.out.println(showInfo2);
        Method work = cls.getDeclaredMethod("work",int.class);
        System.out.println(work);
        System.out.println("-----------------------");
        //è·å–æ–¹æ³•çš„å…·ä½“ç»“æ„ï¼š
        /\*
            @æ³¨è§£
            ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ è¿”å›å€¼ç±»å‹ æ–¹æ³•å(å‚æ•°åˆ—è¡¨) throws XXXXX{}

            //åå­—ï¼š
            System.out.println(work.getName());
        //ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ï¼š
        int modifiers = work.getModifiers();

        //è¿”å›å€¼ï¼š
        System.out.println(work.getReturnType());
        //å‚æ•°åˆ—è¡¨ï¼š
        Class[] parameterTypes = work.getParameterTypes();
        for(Class c:parameterTypes){
            System.out.println(c);
        }

        //è·å–æ³¨è§£ï¼š
        Method myMethod = cls.getMethod("myMethod");
        Annotation[] annotations = myMethod.getAnnotations();
        for(Annotation a:annotations){
            System.out.println(a);
        }

        //è·å–å¼‚å¸¸ï¼š
        Class[] exceptionTypes = myMethod.getExceptionTypes();
        for(Class c:exceptionTypes){
            System.out.println(c);
        }


        //è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
        Object o = cls.newInstance();
        myMethod.invoke(o);//è°ƒç”¨oå¯¹è±¡çš„mymethodæ–¹æ³•

        System.out.println(showInfo2.invoke(o,12,45));;

    }
}

IDE

é›†æˆå¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒï¼ˆIDEï¼ŒIntegrated Development Environment ï¼‰æ˜¯ç”¨äºæä¾›ç¨‹åºå¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒçš„åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬åŒ…æ‹¬ä»£ç ç¼–è¾‘å™¨ã€ç¼–è¯‘å™¨ã€è°ƒè¯•å™¨å’Œå›¾å½¢ç”¨æˆ·ç•Œé¢ç­‰å·¥å…·ã€‚é›†æˆäº†ä»£ç ç¼–å†™åŠŸèƒ½ã€åˆ†æåŠŸèƒ½ã€ç¼–è¯‘åŠŸèƒ½ã€è°ƒè¯•åŠŸèƒ½ç­‰ä¸€ä½“åŒ–çš„å¼€å‘è½¯ä»¶æœåŠ¡å¥—ã€‚æ‰€æœ‰å…·å¤‡è¿™ä¸€ç‰¹æ€§çš„è½¯ä»¶æˆ–è€…è½¯ä»¶å¥—ï¼ˆç»„ï¼‰éƒ½å¯ä»¥å«é›†æˆå¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒã€‚å¦‚å¾®è½¯çš„Visual Studioç³»åˆ—ï¼ŒBorlandçš„C++ Builderã€Delphiç³»åˆ—ç­‰ã€‚è¯¥ç¨‹åºå¯ä»¥ç‹¬ç«‹è¿è¡Œï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å’Œå…¶å®ƒç¨‹åºå¹¶ç”¨ã€‚IDEå¤šè¢«ç”¨äºå¼€å‘HTMLåº”ç”¨è½¯ä»¶ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œè®¸å¤šäººåœ¨è®¾è®¡ç½‘ç«™æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨IDEï¼ˆå¦‚HomeSiteã€DreamWeaverç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå¾ˆå¤šé¡¹ä»»åŠ¡ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆã€‚ç¼–ç¨‹å¼€å‘è½¯ä»¶å°†ç¼–è¾‘ã€ç¼–è¯‘ã€è°ƒè¯•ç­‰åŠŸèƒ½é›†æˆåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ¡Œé¢ç¯å¢ƒä¸­,è¿™æ ·å°±å¤§å¤§æ–¹ä¾¿äº†ç”¨æˆ·ã€‚

â€ä¼˜ç‚¹
